name: River Trail
description: A secluded stretch of the River Trail, where the distant sounds of the nascent settlement are almost entirely absent. You are on the River Trail, a place where the faint murmurs of civilization have faded into a whisper, replaced by the chirping of unseen insects and the gentle rustle of river reeds. The path here is barely maintained, with ruts and loose stones hinting at a forgotten past. The air is fresh, carrying the clean scent of damp earth and river water, a brief respite from the dust and grit of Hill Valley. To the south, a rough path leads towards the rudimentary schoolhouse.
